column4: how can I show "shutdown" and "Reboot" options running LXDE on Ubuntu 11.04?  Usually in Debian I add user to powerdev group, but this group does not even exist for 11.04
show in menu aka allow permission in lxde menu
There are a few people in #lubuntu, maybe someone there could help
Thanks, I'll check at #lubuntu, did not think of irc as I did check to see if they had dedicated forums
